title: AI Stocks Surge Amid Wall Street’s Waning Momentum – Nvidia’s $2 Trillion Valuation Offers Temporary Boost
description: In a whirlwind of market activity fueled by the promise of AI revolutionizing industries, Wall Street experienced a momentous surge in AI stocks as Nvidia, a leading chip designer, momentarily soared to a historic $2 trillion in market valuation. The euphoria surrounding the AI breakthroughs prompted a record-setting day for Wall Street on Thursday, with […]
